RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 250 Y Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 7000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONTE DE CARAMELO speed, best. DIAMONDS FIRE steady gain. BC MARY JEAUX JET out kicked. IMA CALENTE KID no bid. TG COUP ZOOMS broke out, late effort. MATTHEWFIVESIXSEVEN no menace. MS MOOCHIE bumped, no factor.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8400. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DASHIN MOONIE late surge. TMF ROGUE CARTEL out finished. BUX FOR DIAMONDS speed, out kicked late. KOOLN INSEPRABLE late interest. FLAME OF THE YUKON no bid. JRS HEZA MAJESTIC stumbled start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 7500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKIN N MY BOOTS speed, held on. ME JANE YOU TARZAN game second. JRS MAJESTIC BAYOU broke in, bumped, evenly. KILL IN HIS DREAMS bobbled start, good effort. IM FAST N FAMOUS bumped, pinched back, closed well. JJ NANAS LEEJESS erratic trip. ALYSSAS FAME bobbled start, veered in.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 300 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HANDSOME EFFORT bumped, drew clear. DOUBLETHECELEBRATION clear second. LA ESTRELLA ORIENTE game third. SAY WHEN KR broke in, bumped, strong finish. PLAYIN WITH FYRE steady effort. BULLET TRAINE broke out, bumped. ROYALLY STRUTTIN off step slow, good try. CM WAGON TYME no impact. MIGHTYS EAGLE bumped, no bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Doublethecelebration
ENTRY.OWNER: Terrazas Catarino Lozolla Paul and Avila Jorge

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Billy Montgomery S. LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 330 Y Dirt CR: 96. Stakes Purse 25000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weights: 128 lbs. No nomination fee. $250 to pass the entry box and an additional $250 to start. Supplemental nomination of $1,000 will be accepted at time of entry and includes al l fees. $25,000 Guaranteed of which 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 11% to third, 6% to fourth and 3% to fifth. Starters to be named through the entry box by the usual time of closing. Preference to horses with the highest earnings in 2022 - 2023. Diff erent owners will have equal draw according to earnings. The second part of a same owner entry will have no consideration over a single interest. Failure to draw into the race cancels all fees. Louisiana Downs will present a trophy to the winning Owner.No minations Closed Friday, March 10, 2023 with 18 Nominees.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESS DASH FAST driving finish. SAN LORENZO DASH brief foot, out kicked. FEATURED PROSPECT strong finish. MS RED HOT PATRIOT steady drive. LRH HEART OF GLASS in mix, weakened. BT GOT GAME even effort. GO RHONDA GO improved position. ONE SWEET ROGUE steady fade. TASTREAKOFFIRE no threat. CWFASTTRACK never fired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APOLLITICAL KATE good debut. HOLLYWOOD EAGLE clear second. BLOOD AZTEC steady effort. DR LOUISIANA CASH late kick. YOU FEEL ME broke in, in tight late. MISTER TSUNAMI no menace. FREIGHT TRAIN D squeezed, veered in. JETTIN THRU THE SNOW tardy start, veered in.

ENTRY.NAME: Apollitical Kate
ENTRY.OWNER: Espinosa Jose R and Witsiepe Robert

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Downs Maiden Classic S. LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 76. Final Purse 107000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH WERE MAIDENS AS OF THURSDAY, JANUARY 5, 2023 AND BECAME ELIGIBLE BY A NOMINATION FEE OF $750 WITH LOUISIANA DOWNS ON OR BEFORE THURSDAY, JANUARY 5, 2023. Weight: Three Year Olds: 126 lbs. Upward: 128 lbs. $20,000 Adde d of which 40% to the winner, 17% to second, 10% to third, 7% to fourth, 6% to fifth, 5% to sixth, 4.5% to seventh, 4% to eighth, 3.5% to ninth and 3% to tenth. An additional $750 second and final payment was due on Friday, February 17, 2023. $3,000 Supp lemental nomination will be accepted at time of entry and includes all fees, but must be a maiden at original nomination date of THURSDAY, JANUARY 5, 2023. TRIALS TO BE RUN ON FRIDAY, MARCH 10, 2023. Louisiana Downs will present a trophy to the winning Ow ner. Nominations Closed Thursday , January 5, 2023 with 45 Nominees.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE HEROINE popped, held on. JET BLACK MOON late effort, missed. BLOOD N CORONAS fought gamely. RAISE ANOTHER PINT strong effort. AJ TAYLORSYAWLSBOSS late kick. THE PERRY CARTEL in mix, gave way. PO LUCKIE no serious threat. RELENTLESS TRES hopped start, ducked in midway.
